main event: A UFO sighting reported in Rivesville, West Virginia on February 9, 1964, involving one object observed for 3 minutes with erratic movement.
interesting points: The object was observed using ground radar but lacked sufficient detail for a comprehensive evaluation., Much conflicting information was reported regarding the sightings., The sighting was part of Project Blue Book, which investigated UFO reports., Witnesses described the object as circular and emitting a bright light., The Air Force evaluated the sighting but found no unusual meteorological phenomena to explain the sightings.
sighted object: one circular object with bright light
witness description: The witness reported the object as circular and bright, with erratic movement.
